abstract: The chairman of the House Appropriations Committee said the panel was investigating the emergency agency's last-minute decision to finish the fiscal year with no additional funds.
snippet: The chairman of the House Appropriations Committee said the panel was investigating the emergency agency's last-minute decision to finish the fiscal year with no additional funds.
lead_paragraph: The House Appropriations Committee is investigating the Federal Emergency Management Agency's last-minute decision to finish the 2011 fiscal year with no additional funds, the panel's chairman said on Tuesday.
